content: mini toque pattern these tiny hats knit up super quick and are the perfect size to hang on your christmas tree as a ornament attach to a gift card for a quick teacher appreciation present or use as an adorable wine bottle topper this project is a great way to use up leftover scraps of yarn in any weight and needle size you have available sizes one size measurements dk weight hat- approximately 2 w x 2 75 l worsted weight hat- approximately 2 5 w x 3 l aran weight hat- approximately 2 75 w x 3 25 l gauge n/a needle size dk weight- us 6 4mm dpns worsted weight- us 8 5mm dpns aran weight- us 10 6mm dpns yarn/yardage dk weight- sandnes garn peer gynt 2 5yds / 2m / 5g hat only 3 5yds / 3m / 7g hat & pom pom worsted weight- knit picks wool of the andes 2 25yds / 2m / 5g hat only 3 5yds / 3m / 8g hat & pom pom aran weight- we are knitter s the petite wool approximately 4yds / 3 5m / 6g hat only 6 5yds / 6m / 10g hat & pom pom notions 1 stitch marker yarn needle scissors measuring tape all measurements and yardages are approximations and are rounded written instructions in american knitting terms feel free to sell any items made from this pattern in small quantities no wholesale orders and please give credit to my shop fibers and pines please do not sell copy or give my pattern away if you have any questions at any time please email me at hello@fibersandpines com and i will respond as quickly as i can no returns or refunds can be accepted >>> instagram @fibersandpines >>> pinterest fibersandpines >>> youtube fibersandpines thanks and happy knitting © 2025 fibers and pines all rights reserved
